Lab

Our research deals with the interaction and coevolution of structure and dynamics. Our focus is on network theory, but also general nonlinear dynamics in structured systems. [From Laurent]

Dimension reduction of complex networks

Reducing the complexity of dynamical complex networks through their spectral properties

Reducing the complexity of dynamical complex networks through their spectral properties

About us

We are a research group dedicated to the understanding of complex networks.
